comments.body: This is fine for this PR, but in future PRs adding types you'll have to use [this template](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/declaration-files/templates/module-function-d-ts.html) since the underlying library is exporting a function using CommonJS convention. Likewise you'll need to use the [require syntax](https://www.typescriptlang.org/docs/handbook/modules.html#export--and-import--require) in your tests to import it.
